item.title: Anthropic users face a new choice – opt out or share your chats for AI training
item.description: Anthropic is making some major changes to how it handles user data. Users have until September 28 to take action.

item.title: Trump administration’s deal is structured to prevent Intel from selling foundry unit
item.description: The deal allows the U.S. to take more equity in Intel if the company doesn't retain at least 51% ownership in its foundry business.

item.title: AI or not, Will Smith’s crowd video is fresh cringe
item.description: Fans accused Will Smith of sharing AI-generated videos from his tour, but the situation is more complicated than it seems.

item.description: Bluesky says it would block access to its service in the state of Mississippi, rather than comply with the new age verification law.
